thread.title: Encounter underway in Kashmir's Bandipora district, 2 Army personnel injured | Zee News
thread.title_full: Encounter underway in Kashmir's Bandipora district, 2 Army personnel injured | Zee News

title: Encounter underway in Kashmir's Bandipora district, 2 Army personnel injured | Zee News
text:
Encounter underway in Kashmir's Bandipora district, 2 Army personnel injured By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Tuesday, February 14, 2017 - 08:27 0 
Srinagar: An encounter between militants and security forces broke out in north Kashmir's Bandipora district on Tuesday, police said here. 
At least two Army personnel got injured in the encounter. 
The firing was going on when last reports came in, an official said. 
Acting on specific intelligence inputs about the presence of militants in the area, security forces launched a cordon and search operation in Parray Mohalla in Hajin area of the district this morning. 
He said while the forces were conducting the search operation, the hiding militants fired upon them, triggering an encounter. 
More details are awaited. First Published: Tuesday, February 14, 2017 - 08:27 More from zeenews
